text:
Hey all, i am new to using HubSpot

I want to ask how to make the template that I created can be published

Is this the template I made, but the website page doesn't appear?

What is the solution, maybe because I just don't understand

Sorry Super slow to get back to this, When I use the HubDB row field theres the choice label field, ie what displays in the select box when selecting the row. All the labels in here are useless, the ideal would be hs_name as it's the title of the page, but it doesn't appear in the list. And i'm not creating a new column just for this purpose
